title: Smash Minecraft Skins
description: A mod for downloading and using your own Minecraft skin to use in-game. Just enter in your username! Includes a custom menu to select a skin, the ability to download a skin from a minecraft username, and on-the-fly file conversion and UI portrait rendering. All written in Rust and running on the Switch itself.
stats: over 1.5 Million views on twitter alone

body.raw:
# Smash Minecraft Skins

A mod that brings Minecraft skins to Super Smash Bros Ultimate...
